name: Himalayan Salt Scrub Face Foot & Body Exfoliator Infused with Collagen and Stem Cell Natural Exfoliating Salt Body Scrub for Toning Cellulite Skin Care by M3 Naturals
about_this_item: M3 Naturals Himalayan Body Scrub! Enjoy the best exfoliating experience not only as a body scrub but also a facial scrub, hand scrub, or foot scrub. Moisturizing and rich in antioxidants, our Himalayan salt with Jojoba oil will help restore your natural skin while scrubbing away unwanted toxins and dead skin cells! *

Exfoliating & Moisturizing! Infused with Collagen and Stem Cell our Himalayan salt will take your skin regimen to the next level providing a boost in natural collagen production and increasing skin cell longevity. M3 offers a powerful line of scrubs women including that delivers unmatched anti-aging skin results. *

A Must-Have Scrub for All Ages! Whether you choose to use our natural Himalayan pink salt as a body scrub or face scrub, our unique blend of ingredients will help reduce the appearance of acne, cellulite, blackheads, wrinkles, fine lines, dark spots, shaving bumps, spider veins, blemishes and more! This skincare product is the perfect bonus to your pedicure kit for an at-home foot spa to enjoy yourself or as a relaxing gift. *

Spa Quality Results! Detox and polish your skin by gently removing unwanted toxins from your pores, adding moisture, and balancing systemic pH. A top-quality pore minimizer that revitalizes healthy skin and works to maintain glowing results! Replace your unwanted skin scrubbers with your new favorite body exfoliating scrub. *

Made in the USA! M3 Naturals is proud to provide men's and women's beauty products with the highest quality natural ingredients that are not only cruelty-free but made right here in the United States of America. *

title: Nice product
content: I have very sensitive skin and the product burned a bit. The first time I used it, but I added more water and it was much better. I actually like it a lot and it is a great exfoliation. Good value for the money. Just make sure you add enough water to the mixture if you have sensitive skin.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: My skin feels so much smother after I use this,  the smell is pleasing, and I just can't say enough good things about it.. the only negative is I use to much, so it won't last long.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2024

title: This stuff is amazing
content: I picked up the Turmeric scrub after using the Superfood scrub for over a year and, for the first time in my life (I am 39) experiencing a clear face with absolutely no acne or blemishes. A week without the Superfood and the blemishes started to return. Unfortunately, Superfood did not pop back up as an available option here, so in desperation I read the ingredients on all other scrubs by M3 and picked the Turmeric. It burns my face, and because of the ingredients and smaller coarse/exfoliating particles, it does not easily move across the face to effectively exfoliate the way the Superfood did. I will say that it moisturizes better, but I have a fragrance-free light facial lotion for that and believe that, overall, this product just won't replace what I came to enjoy in the Superfood blend. Such a bummer, now I am on the hunt once again to find a product that will help with breakouts.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: It’s hard to believe that a black, gritty product would leave skin so soft and smooth, but it does.  Indulge yourself and reap the benefits.

title: Verified Purchase
content: -Maybe it's my skin type or something, but whenever this stuff gets on the back of either hands (and if you use it while showering like I do, it will get all over your hands) it causes an irritating/stinging sensation. Kind of like a light rash. It's bearable now, but when I first used it, I got a bit worried it wouldn't go away (It goes away in a couple a minutes after you wash it off thankfully). This happens sporadically now, but during the first couple of weeks it happened every time. I'm guessing it's the salt in it (it has dead sea salt) as some parts of my skin hates salt water with a passion.

title: Verified Purchase
content: So, ad others have pointed out, the product definitely does not arrive looking as moist ad it does in the pictures. I compared it to the scrub I have from a nationally recognized body product retailer and immediately started adding coconut oil. But, after a out a tablespoon or so, I stopped myself. I questioned if maybe there was a reason it was made that way. I decided to try it out and compare the results of the two. I started scrubbing with the M3, after a workout, and almost immediately noticed a lemongrass scent fill the shower. But it was not heavy and did not linger. I don't mind lemongrass but some people might find that upsetting. The scrub goes on just like any other. As a matter of fact, since it was drier, I think I noticed the crystals/grains more. After drying off, I noticed my skin felt VERY nicely moisturized. It's hard to describe but it was not an oily feeling as some scrubs give, just a pleasent sense that the moisturize was there and working on my skin, so a lotion would not be necessary. Also, I didn't notice any fragrance of lemongrass clinging to me. I like the lack of a scent because it allows me to perfume  my skin the way I would like afterwards. Also my bathtub didn't seem oily afterwards; a big plus for cleaning up. Overall, I felt very good, kind of rejuvenated, after using it.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2024

title: Give it a try before judging it due to lack of oil
content: In comparison, next time I worked out, I used my other brand of scrub. It has a nice Lavender and Sandalwood sent that lingers. It has lots of oil and you definitely notice it as you scrub your body. I got out of my bath gently surrounded buy it's relaxing scent. After drying of I noticed my skin felt highly moisturized. But also that if I rubbed my fingers against it, I felt the oil was getting on my hands too. Only very slightly mind you, I didn't feel greasy or anything. Just that maybe there was a thin layer of oil lingering on top of my skin. Also my bathtub definitely looked like it was covered in oil. I wouldn't use this on my face, but my body felt lovely. I didn't feel the need to put anything on my skin for a long time afterwards. Overall, this scrub felt delicious and relaxing.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: In short, I honestly prefer the M3 a little more. But it also matter what you're looking to get out of the scrub. The M3 came with a sticker offering the next one free and I plan to partake. title: Possibly best charcoal scrub for your skin
content: M3's charcoal scrub belongs in the praise section. It works well and the customer support behind it is top-notch as well. I always had problems with breakouts around my face near and around my nose and mouth area. This never subsided even into adulthood. The only effective treatment was antibiotics but that's not sustainable so I'm always on the lookout for new products. It doesn't hurt, right? Well about a year or two ago, I saw this product and bought it. It was costly but I didn't worry too much about finances at the time so no harm no foul. Tried it and immediately saw positive results within the week. I only used the products maybe a couple of times a month and that was enough to keep my skin clear of whiteheads and other blemishes.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: recently, my living situation has gotten more crowded and a very inconsiderate person would like to use my products without care. This person took a liking to the M3 charcoal scrub, no surprise there, and depleted my supply. My financial situation isn't as stable as it was before but I was still going to buy it again, just to make sure I search for the correct product I saved the container. It wasn't until I was looking at the container again that I notice the promotional ad offering a free container. I didn't think they would still honor the ad but they did! So luckily for me, I got a replacement and this time I"m going to keep it in my room. M3 had me as a repeat customer before but now I'm a bonafide fanboy!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2024

title: Kinda oily...
content: Love the coral color of this Himalayan Scrub crystals, and the scent is nice, kind of like the smell of citrus. Oranges maybe. The jar was not full when it arrived, but I think that's just the way it comes. The crystals are soft, and you'll need quite a bit to do an entire body. What I did not like about these crystals was the oily feeling on my body after rubbing them on with my hands. My arms and shoulders felt heavily oiled--not soft and smooth, but oily, and not in a good way, almost as if I'd rubbed on a thin layer of Vaseline. I needed to use a bar of soap to get the feel of oil off my hands. Might not bother some people, but that wasn't what I was hoping for. I have a friend who likes the product, so rather than return it, I'm giving it to her.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024

title: Ok product
content: After experiencing symptoms of redness, dryness, and irritation for 5 days (on the 3rd day is when I created the first review) today my skin is finally coming back to its normal state. It was painful for a few days to apply my facial products and it left my skin itchy, peeling and mostly INFLAMED. It wasn't a good experience, but something very interesting occurred once the symptoms of redness and irritation slowly faded away. The acne scars on my cheeks were healed and less noticeable today when I woke up this morning, and the appearance of my skin looks SO MUCH BETTER. I cannot give full credit to this product because my serums and moisturizers contain acne-scarring healing ingredients(and I was using aloe vera a few times this week too for the dryness, irritation, and flakiness), but I believe the dryness caused by this product caused by skin and pores to tighten immensely, and therefore my skin was able to heal faster as a result. This is all speculation, but I haven't seen my skin heal so quickly in a matter of a few days. I'm not sure if I will ever use this product again, but I may keep it just in case for spot treatment for scars specifically, but not for my entire face.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2024

title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT IF YOU HAVE SENSITIVE SKIN ***UPDATED REVIEW***
content: In the beginning, it seemed appealing to me to buy this product for 3 reasons: The amount of positive reviews (8,000+), charcoal scrubs have helped clear up my sensitive-combination skin in the past, and it contain stem cells, which I thought could've assisted with healing my scars. The first time using, I didn't like how it easily dissolves in water and how much of a mess it makes on my white sink top. The scrub was very dry and needed water to be able to apply to skin, or else it's VERY abrasive and irritating. I didn't like it so I put it on my shelf for a couple weeks, until finally I decided to give it another go. Before application, I made sure to fill it up with water and mix it, because then it would be easier to apply. I rubbed it on my skin and it was much better, but still very messy. I kept it on for 10-20 minutes MAX and finally washed it off and moisturized my skin. Everything was okay for awhile, but as I was working later on that night, I slowly started noticing how itchy my neck and cheeks were becoming. By the time I went home and took off my mask after work, the whole bottom of my face, cheeks, jaw, chin, and neck, were RED ASF all over, and my skin erupted in a rash. It is officially 2 and half days after that incident, and my skin is still red, bumpy, and irritated. I WILL NEVER USE THIS PRODUCT AGAIN. ON GOD. This is one of the worst facial masks I've ever used... and I've used at least more than 30 types of face masks in my entire lifespan. Please do not buy this if you have sensitive skin. SAVE YOURSELF!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: Love this product! Highly recommend! I have sensitive skin and have no problems. The way it made my face feel was unbelievably soft. I started getting comments on how great my skin looked. Definitely noticed smaller pores as well.  I use just a dab once or twice a week. I could probably use it even less often, but I love the product.
